document_data.name: City Guard of Halwa
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Halwa]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Solitude".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 3,000 guardsmen, 500 palace guards, and 1,000 [[mercenary]] cavalry. [[Zarad]] also had a personal guard of 200 men and could call upon another 200 [[jann]] if needed.
document_data.Activities: The mercenaries for the cavalry were hired from the surrounding desert tribes on five year contracts.
